channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- ActiveCampaign
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- ActiveCampaign

item.title: CVE-2023-0233|2024-08-02T05:02:44.059Z -- unknown -- activecampaign
item.description: The ActiveCampaign WordPress plugin before 8.1.12 does not validate and escape some of its block options before outputting them back in a page/post where the block is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
